properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO, REPORT_MEM_NO, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_PLUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ? )
SELECT REPORT_NO, M.MEM_ID, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_RESULT FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = R.REPORT_MEM_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO ASC

SELECT REPORT_NO, M.MEM_ID, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_RESULT FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = R.REPORT_MEM_NO WHERE REPORT_RESULT IS NULL ORDER BY REPORT_NO ASC

SELECT REPORT_NO, M.MEM_ID, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_RESULT FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = R.REPORT_MEM_NO WHERE REPORT_RESULT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY REPORT_NO ASC
SELECT REPORT_NO, M.MEM_ID, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_RESULT, REPORT_PLUS FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = R.REPORT_MEM_NO WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
SELECT FEED_NO, M.MEM_ID, FEED_TITLE, FEED_TEXT, FEED_TAG, FEED_DELETED, FEED_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM FEED JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) WHERE FEED_NO = ?
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DELETED, FEED_NO, M.MEM_ID FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) WHERE REPLY_NO = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO, M.MEM_ID, PLACE_NO, REVIEW_COUNT, REVIEW_MENU_TYPE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_DELETED, P.PLACE_NAME FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) JOIN PLACE P USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
SELECT REVIEW_PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM REVIEW_PHOTO WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_RESULT = 'D' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_RESULT = 'U' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_RESULT = 'D' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE REVIEW_PHOTO SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
SELECT TAG_NO, TAG_CONTENT, REVIEW_NO WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO, R.REVIEW_NO, MEM_NICKNAME, REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO, REPORT_MEM_NO, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_PLUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, '리뷰', ? )
